job_title: Scientific Research Writing-Biotech/Life Science with Artificial Intelligence
description: Limerine is at the forefront of innovation in life sciences and biotechnology. We are seeking passionate and driven interns to join our dynamic team. If you have a keen interest in cutting-edge research and a desire to contribute to the future of biotechnology, this internship is for you.  Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:  1.
